data.eml:eml: On the Sicilian species of Pseudomeira Stierlin (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bellò, Cesare, Baviera, Cosimo (2011): On the Sicilian species of Pseudomeira Stierlin (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae). Zootaxa 3100: 35-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204879
